content.raw: 7 is the correct number. There are 9 columns. In the footer, there is one `colspan=2` so the other `colspan` must be 7.
content.html: 7 is the correct number. There are 9 columns. In the footer, there is one colspan=2 so the other colspan must be 7.

content.raw: I think that 6 is the right number here. If I set it to 9 the whole table shrinks.![Selection_019.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/pgag6k/images/1640426430-Selection_019.png)
content.html: I think that 6 is the right number here. If I set it to 9 the whole table shrinks.
